dairy_farm.name: Dairy Farm
dairy_farm.description: Communication between dairy farm manager and workers about daily farm operations, cow health, milking schedules, and equipment maintenance.

farm.name: Farm / Agriculture
farm.description: Communication about general farming operations, crop management, livestock care, equipment, and seasonal tasks.

construction.name: Construction
construction.description: Communication about construction site operations, safety procedures, materials, equipment, and building tasks.

restaurant.name: Restaurant
restaurant.description: Communication about kitchen operations, food preparation, orders, customer service, and hygiene standards.

warehouse.name: Warehouse
warehouse.description: Communication about inventory management, shipping, receiving, picking, packing, and logistics.

other.name: General Workplace
other.description: General workplace communication between managers and workers.
